summary: As a real estate professional, I help set up (complex) construction and real estate projects and lead them to achieve the intended goal. At the start, we devise plans together by drawing up feasibility studies (business cases) or analyzes of the current real estate portfolio. After all, we want to achieve at least the maximum social and financial return on the property. With my pragmatic attitude and, moreover, I am not easily confused, I am always looking for opportunities to lift real estate to a commercial and more sustainable plan and to make it function more efficiently. My knowledge of the construction and real estate chain I combine with a feeling for processes and commercial, political and administrative decision-making. We prefer to keep it simple. If it helps, I make complex situations with many interests and stakeholders transparent, or I provide new insights. Through this way of working I get people moving and I realize deals and projects.

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

education.field_of_study: Executive Master of Science in Real Estate, TiasNimbas Business School

school.name: De Haagse Hogeschool / The Hague University of Applied Sciences

projects.title: NSP Breda
projects.description: NSP Breda is een complex binnenstedelijk stationsproject waar reizen, wonen, werken en winkelen in één gebied samenkomen. Als enige Brabantse stad met een rechtstreekse shuttleaansluiting op de hogesnelheidslijn Amsterdam-Rotterdam-Brussel-Parijs is Breda dé Poort van Brabant. Binnen één uur staat de reiziger hartje Schiphol, en in nog geen half uur kan hij vanuit Breda in de hogesnelheidstrein zitten, op weg naar Parijs. Het station wordt het kloppend hart voor iedereen die bij een internationaal vervoerknooppunt wil wonen, werken en winkelen. In het station zelf komen woningen, kantoren en winkels. Het nieuwe station biedt voldoende capaciteit aan het groeiend aantal reizigers.  Het stationsgebied van Breda is een van de zes door het ministerie van VROM aangewezen nieuwe sleutelprojecten.

contributors.headline: Eigenaar bij Quattro Bouw en Vastgoed Advies BV

profile_positions.description: In de rol van planontwikkelaar bij RvR ben ik verantwoordelijk voor het oppakken van ruimtelijke vraagstukken en het initiëren van woningbouwontwikkeling. Binnen deze rol creëer ik nieuwe mogelijkheden in overleg met eigenaren, overheden en belanghebbenden en voer ik regie over de RO trajecten tot een bestemmingsplan.
profile_positions.title: Plan- en gebiedsontwikkelaar

profile_positions.description:
Laride increases the quality of life-environment from an independent position on behalf of corporations, governments, education, healthcare or commercial parties. My tasks are: 
- initiate plans, 
- build bridges between parties, 
- project development, 
- project management.

In the role of Development Manager and senior Project Manager, I am responsible for the development and realization of new construction projects from initiative to rental / sale and delivery for various clients. going through zoning and permit processes, environmental management, concluding agreements, up to and including rental/sale and delivery for various clients (corporations, municipalities, developers, investors). Projects include transformation of the Kluis (31 homes) and the Loft (33 homes) in Weert, Hof van Langfoor in Sittard (28 homes), MFA in Hapert, Manresa in Venlo (42 homes), Boswinkel in Enschede (282 homes), optimization care location Kromme Haagdijk in Mierlo-Hout.
profile_positions.title: Development Manager

profile_positions.description: Development and realization of new construction projects for the corporation and for Accent. From initiative, going through zoning and permit processes, environmental management, concluding agreements, up to and including rental/sale and delivery. Projects include the transformation of the Kluis (31 homes) and the Loft (33 homes) in Weert, Hof van Langfoor in Sittard (28 homes), Manresa in Venlo (42 homes), Prins Bernhardstraat in Venray and Dr. Jaegersstraat in Heerlen
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager (Interim by Laride)
Real Estate Professional | own company

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the strategic acquisition of telecom related real estate and setting up transactions. Hereby I represented the interests of international investors by building and maintaining my own customer base with land lords. Especially the "deals" where added value is created for all stakeholders involved, gave me satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Site Acquisition Manager, Telecom Vastgoed by APWireless

profile_positions.description: Setting up real estate transactions and conducting negotiations carefully and with integrity with various parties. I hereby represented the property interests of ProRail with successful transactions as a result. Here I switched between operational and administrative level and I focused on mostly complex disposition processes. For the correct information, I involved internal and external experts in the field of, among other things, tax matters, legal affairs, notarial practice, valuations and soil hygiene. In my portfolio included: positions within the Arnhem Station Area Master Plan, the Hofbogen in Rotterdam, development of the RET remodeling site of the RET, selling various track-related buildings, sale of the Hoekse Lijn, the German Line / Boxteler Bahn, land sale for the benefit of residential area Koningsoord Tilburg, Spoorpark Tilburg and residential tower The Hague Vlietpoort.
profile_positions.title: Real Estate manager

profile_positions.description: I worked as a cost expert on construction projects within the railway environment. Within this role I was responsible for the preparation of multidisciplinary feasibility studies, estimates and cost statements. I then advised the project managers about this. I contracted advising and constructing parties and I negotiated during the execution of the work. Projects included the Rotterdam, Breda, Amsterdam and Delft station projects. In addition, the new construction projects for bicycle parking facilities, stops (including Hoevelaken) and the new traffic control post in Utrecht. I made the most important cooperation partners within complex and unclear projects cost-conscious by communicating the costs clearly, simply and therefore clearly. In this way I helped the decision makers and also the negotiations. I have strategically strengthened the position of the procurement department by increasing the involvement of the projects department.
profile_positions.title: Construction cost manager & advisor construction contracts matters

profile_positions.description: I was responsible for land and building operations from allotment up to and including realization and sales. I have prepared the business cases in which free-to-name prices were weighed against investment costs and accounted to the management in order to obtain a budget to start projects. The architect and consultants and contractors then had to be contracted and managed. Budget and time limits were guaranteed and monitored by me. I did this by regularly drawing up, coordinating and testing schedules, as well as designing (or having them tested) for construction costs and additional costs. I led concept teams, development teams and construction teams and worked out plans, designs and agreements. The plans had to be coordinated with the municipalities for permits and any private law agreements. During this period I worked in particular on Helmond Brandevoort "de Buitens", center plan "de Veste", Tilburg "Stappegoor" and Vught "Stadhouderspark". I think project development is the most beautiful profession in the world because of the different expertise and working towards common goals. My organizational talent and my architectural and financial knowledge were of great value in this period.
profile_positions.title: Project leader and developer housing

profile_positions.description: Within ProRail I worked as the only structural cost manager. With that, all construction work on and around the track came to me with regard to budgeting, contracting architects, advisers and contractors, the assessment of delivered products, all additional and less work conversations and all tendering strategies to be determined. Projects included the Arnhem, Rotterdam and Amsterdam station projects. In addition, the new construction projects of bicycle parking facilities, stops (including Helmond Brandevoort), renovations of station buildings and the national contracting of programs such as the engineering and construct contracts of the access gates at the stations and the design of the new furniture at all statio
profile_positions.title: Construction cost manager & advisor construction contracts matters

profile_positions.description: The preparation of construction cost budgets, investment cost budgets, calculations, management budgets, measurement reports and reporting and advising thereof. I have worked on the following projects: Helmond Brandevoort "de Veste", "Dutch Forensic Institute" in The Hague, office building "WDX" on the High Tech Campus, multiple housing projects, nursing homes, office buildings and other utility buildings. My affinity with engineering and a sense of numbers were expressed in this period. I was also a hard worker in the consultancy world, I liked going out to clients and I had a lot of contact with suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Construction cost advisor

profile_positions.description: During my education I set myself the goal of cycling to the south of Europe. I have achieved that goal. The beautiful Spanish city of Seville has been reached via a "tourist" route of 4800 km in 2 months. I have become a fan of the Alpine region and even more of Andalusia. What lies behind the horizon and what lies beyond? That can all be achieved on your own! I have personally experienced a few wisdoms, namely that it is not the goal that is most important, but the road to it. And without valleys there are no tops!
profile_positions.title: Ontdekkingsreiziger te fietsExplorer by bike
